title: Low Crop Production Index
description: In 2022, Malta's crop production index was recorded at 53.79, indicating a significant decline compared to the 2014-2016 baseline of 100.

title: High Energy Dependency
description: Malta's energy imports accounted for 389.55% of its energy use in 2022, highlighting a heavy reliance on external energy sources.

title: Minimal Methane Emissions from Energy
description: In 2015, Malta's methane emissions from fugitive emissions in the energy sector were extremely low, at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.
